document.docAuthor: Pocco, Martina E., Minutolo, Carolina, Dinghi, Pablo A., Lange, Carlos E., Confalonieri, Viviana A. & Cigliano, María Marta
document.docOrigin: Zoological Journal of the Linnean Society 174 (4)
document.masterDocTitle: Species delimitation in the Andean grasshopper genus Orotettix Ronderos & Carbonell (Orthoptera: Melanoplinae): an integrative approach combining morphological, molecular and biogeographical data

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Species delimitation in the Andean grasshopper genus Orotettix Ronderos & Carbonell (Orthoptera: Melanoplinae): an integrative approach combining morphological, molecular and biogeographical data
Zoological Journal of the Linnean Society

subSubSection.paragraph:
Paradichroplus andeanus Bruner, L. 1913: 185
[ Holotype , male, Cusco , Peru , National Museum of Natural History , Washington D.C. (USNM)];

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Orotettix andeanus : Ronderos & Carbonell, 1994: 88
;
Eades et al ., 2015
.

subSubSection.paragraph: Measurements (in mm) Body length: males 13.88 (13– 15.5), females 18.75 (16–24); femur III: males 8.38 (7.5– 9), females 11.8 (11–13); tegmina length: males 2.52 (2–3), females 3.87 (3–4.8).
